meanings.sent1: The fireproof safe was made of incombustibles materials.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter praised the incombustibles curtains for their safety features.
meanings.sent3: The incombustibles oven mitts saved the day when the cookies almost burned.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an incombustibles shield against failure.
meanings.sent5: The incombustibles barrier protected the forest from the spreading wildfire.

meanings.definition: Materials that do not burn easily.
meanings.sent1: The building was constructed using incombustibles materials to prevent fire hazards.
meanings.sent2: The incombustibles insulation kept the house warm without the risk of burning.
meanings.sent3: The incombustibles fabric resisted the flames during the fire drill.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was like an incombustibles wall in the face of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The incombustibles properties of the metal made it ideal for industrial use.
